posts.title: Med-VQA via Conditional Reasoning
posts.text: The report of Medical Visual Question Answering via Conditional Reasoning [ACM MM 2020]. We propose a novel conditional reasoning framework for Med-VQA, aiming to automatically learn effective reasoning skills for various Med-VQA tasks >Features QCR [question-conditioned reasoning module]Guide the importance selection over multimodal fusion features. TCR [type-conditioned reasoning module]Learn a different set of reasoning skills for closed-ended and open-ended Med-VQA tasks separately. >Results We evaluate our proposal on VQA-RAD dataset. Overall Open-ended Closed-ended Base 66.1 49.2 77.2 Our proposal 71.6 60.0 79.3 >Visualization >Contributors Li-Ming Zhan Bo Liu Lu Fan Jia-Xin Chen Xiao-Ming Wu (Supervisor) >CitationLi-Ming Zhan, Bo Liu, Lu Fan, Jiaxin Chen, and Xiao-Ming Wu. 2020. Medical Visual Question Answering via Conditional Reasoning. In Proceedings of the 28th ACM International Conference on Multimedia (MM ‘20). Association for Computing Machinery, New York, NY, USA, 2345–2354. DOI:https://doi.org/10.1145/3394171.3413761
